info.name: DNS SaaS Service Detection
author: noah @thesubtlety
pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13792
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.onpe.org.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13792
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.onpe.org.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.onpe.org.	10800	IN	CNAME	webredir.gandi.net.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32201
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.onpe.org.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32201
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.onpe.org.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.onpe.org.	10800	IN	CNAME	webredir.gandi.net.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
gandi.net.	1200	IN	SOA	dns0.gandi.net. hostmaster.gandi.net. 2023121400 900 900 1209600 1200

info.name: Missing Subresource Integrity
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Checks if script tags within the HTML response have Subresource Integrity implemented via the integrity attribute

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.onpe.org
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept-Encoding: gzip

L'Observatoire National de la Précarité Énergétique

Selon la loi du 12 juillet 2010 portant engagement national pour l’environnement, « est en situation de précarité énergétique une personne qui éprouve dans son logement des difficultés particulières à disposer de la fourniture d’énergie nécessaire à la satisfaction de ses besoins élémentaires en raison de l’inadaptation de ses ressources ou conditions d’habitat »

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
